![](images/Python-logo-notext.svg.png){width="300"}

# download and install python

## check python version

::: {#16776aeb .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import sys
print(sys.version)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
3.13.2 (v3.13.2:4f8bb3947cf, Feb  4 2025, 11:51:10) [Clang 15.0.0 (clang-1500.3.9.4)]
```
:::
:::


## delete old version python in mac

### delete framework

Go-\>computer-\>Macintosh HD-\>Library-\>Frameworks-\>Python.framework-\>Versions

Delete the old version python folder:

![](images/clipboard-613753018.png)

### delete python file

list all python file

```{bash}
ls /usr/local/bin/python*
```

![](images/paste-1.png)

delete the old version

```{bash}
brew uninstall python@3.11
```

## set python version in Rstudio

list all file in home path

::: {#d6688d9e .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
ls -a
```
:::


find .Renviron and edit to new version

::: {#4d1e19b5 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
nano .Renviron
```
:::


![](images/clipboard-2838033785.png){width="510"}

# install jupyter

::: {#46c32da0 .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
python3 -m pip install jupyter
```
:::


# work with file

## get current directory

::: {#da6603de .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import os
os.getcwd()
```
:::


## get all file name under current directory

::: {#caca0c42 .cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import os
os.listdir(os.getcwd()) 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2}
```
['.Rhistory',
 'test_folder',
 '.DS_Store',
 'images',
 '0 Basic python.qmd',
 'hotels.csv',
 '.RData',
 '3 statistic Book.qmd',
 '1 Python Book.qmd',
 '2 Data Book.qmd',
 'data',
 '0 Basic python.quarto_ipynb']
```
:::
:::


## get file info

::: {#f37a02da .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
a=os.stat('3 statistic Book.qmd')
a
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3}
```
os.stat_result(st_mode=33188, st_ino=69773616, st_dev=16777229, st_nlink=1, st_uid=501, st_gid=20, st_size=453, st_atime=1740969674, st_mtime=1712419159, st_ctime=1740969673)
```
:::
:::


show st_atime

::: {#d696c65f .cell execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import datetime as dt
#a.st_atime
dt.date.fromtimestamp(a.st_atime).strftime('%Y%m%d')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4}
```
'20250303'
```
:::
:::


## create folder

create it if not exist

::: {#1626ad57 .cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
if not os.path.exists('test_folder'): 
  os.mkdir('test_folder') 
```
:::


## delete folder

::: {#3573fd6e .cell execution_count=10}
``` {.python .cell-code}
os.rmdir('test_folder')
```
:::


## delete file

::: {#e4d5221b .cell execution_count=11}
``` {.python .cell-code}
os.remove('test.csv')
```
:::


## copy file

::: {#6ec0e828 .cell execution_count=12}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import shutil

shutil.copyfile('test.csv', 'test2.csv')
```
:::


## downlaod file online

::: {#8b2804aa .cell execution_count=13}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import urllib.request

url="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-02-11/hotels.csv"

urllib.request.urlretrieve(url, "hotels.csv")
```
:::


# Condition with if/elif/else

::: {#19cfc260 .cell execution_count=14}
``` {.python .cell-code}
a = 200
b = 33
if b > a:
  print("b is greater than a")
elif a == b:
  print("a and b are equal")
else:
  print("a is greater than b")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
a is greater than b
```
:::
:::


# Loop

## for Loop

::: {#50a05791 .cell execution_count=15}
``` {.python .cell-code}
fruits = ["apple", "banana", "cherry"]
for x in fruits:
  print(x)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
apple
banana
cherry
```
:::
:::


## for enumerate Loop

it will add index

::: {#6edf682b .cell execution_count=16}
``` {.python .cell-code}
fruits = ["apple", "banana", "cherry"]

list(enumerate(fruits))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7}
```
[(0, 'apple'), (1, 'banana'), (2, 'cherry')]
```
:::
:::


::: {#18009c99 .cell execution_count=17}
``` {.python .cell-code}
for index,i in enumerate(fruits):
  print("The index is:",index)
  print("The element is:",i)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
The index is: 0
The element is: apple
The index is: 1
The element is: banana
The index is: 2
The element is: cherry
```
:::
:::


## while Loop

::: {#ffc7995c .cell execution_count=18}
``` {.python .cell-code}
i = 1
while i < 4:
  print(i)
  i += 1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
1
2
3
```
:::
:::


with break statement

::: {#26aa60e0 .cell execution_count=19}
``` {.python .cell-code}
i = 1
while i < 6:
  print(i)
  if i == 3:
    break
  i += 1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
1
2
3
```
:::
:::


# function

## without Arguments

::: {#42621a5e .cell execution_count=20}
``` {.python .cell-code}
def my_function():
  print("Hello from a function")
```
:::


::: {#07117e33 .cell execution_count=21}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_function()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Hello from a function
```
:::
:::


## with Arguments

::: {#7649c6d2 .cell execution_count=22}
``` {.python .cell-code}
def my_function(x):
  print(x + " !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!")
```
:::


::: {#c16ab6ae .cell execution_count=23}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_function('hello')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
hello !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
```
:::
:::


## with default Arguments

::: {#11d201b7 .cell execution_count=24}
``` {.python .cell-code}
def my_function(x='hello'):
  print(x + " !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!")
```
:::


::: {#d8394440 .cell execution_count=25}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_function()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
hello !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
```
:::
:::


## return result

::: {#fd47eff0 .cell execution_count=26}
``` {.python .cell-code}
def adding_ten(x):
  a=x+10
  return(a)
```
:::


::: {#34bb4964 .cell execution_count=27}
``` {.python .cell-code}
result=adding_ten(3)
result
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=18}
```
13
```
:::
:::


## lambda function

it a faster way to do function

::: {#ef3312bb .cell execution_count=28}
``` {.python .cell-code}
lambda_adding_ten=lambda x:x+10
```
:::


::: {#53dce1d6 .cell execution_count=29}
``` {.python .cell-code}
lambda_adding_ten(4)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=20}
```
14
```
:::
:::


# List Comprehension

its a for loop in list

::: {#d1841c40 .cell execution_count=30}
``` {.python .cell-code}
fruits = ["apple", "banana", "cherry", "kiwi", "mango"]

newlist = [x for x in fruits if "a" in x]

print(newlist)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
['apple', 'banana', 'mango']
```
:::
:::


# Package

## install package

The Python Package Index (PyPI).<https://pypi.org//>

![](images/logo-large.516e776d.svg){width="300"}

::: {#19a70e89 .cell execution_count=31}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import os
os.system('pip3 install scikit-learn')
os.system('pip3 install tensorflow')
os.system('pip3 install pandas')
os.system('pip3 install SciPy')
```
:::


## check one package version

::: {#33f12bff .cell execution_count=32}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import os
os.system('pip show scikit-learn')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=22}
```
256
```
:::
:::

::: {#ae6f12c4 .cell execution_count=34}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import site; site.getsitepackages()
```
